summary: This is an internal Federal Bureau of Prisons memorandum from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, detailing shift assignments for Lieutenants for the third quarter of 2019 (August 25 to November 24). It is a routine administrative document related to prison staffing.
locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is dated July 29, 2019, and schedules staff shifts for the period August 25, 2019, to November 24, 2019.
It originates from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
The document is a routine administrative memo for prison staff assignments and does not mention any specific inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein.
The document number EFTA00142568 is part of the publicly released Epstein case documents.
